# kong-gateway_key_auth (Resource)

KeyAuth Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_key_auth" "my_keyauth" {
  consumer = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  id  = "...my_id..."
  key = "...my_key..."
  tags = [
    "..."
  ]
}
```
